Package neuralnetwork

Class Trainer

java.lang.Object
neuralnetwork.Trainer
public class Trainer
extends java.lang.Object
A network trainer class. Encapsulates the neural network and forward/backward propagation of it.
Author:
Valdemar Melin

      public Trainer​(int[] networkStructure)

      public void randomWeights​(double range)
      Makes all weights random numbers between -range and range.

    • evaluate

      public void evaluate​(double[][] inputs, double[][] outputs)
      Evaluates the gradient of the cost function with the specified training data.
      Parameters:
      inputs - - the input training data
      outputs - - the output training data Time complexity: O(M*N*O) where M: number of training data, N: number of weights, O: number of ouputs.

    • gradientSize

      public double gradientSize()
      Returns:
      the norm of the gradient.

    • cost

      public double cost​(double[][] inputs, double[][] outputs)
      Computes the value of the cost function. The cost function is defined as the sum of the difference of the output and the correct output squared.
      Parameters:
      inputs -
      outputs -

    • getOutput

      public void getOutput​(double[] input, double[] output)
      Inputs some data to the network and calculates the output.
      Parameters:
      input -
      output -

    • step

      public void step​(double s)
      Updates all weights and biases in the direction of -gradient
      Parameters:
      s - - the step size
